website_summaries.verdict: While these capsules won't appeal to everyone, coffee enthusiasts who like a bit of sweet flavor and aroma are likely to appreciate the notes of caramel in every sip.
pros: Stands out from other brews on our list for having a caramel flavor with hints of vanilla without being overpowering
Adding cream or milk enhances the flavor of this fairly mild coffee
cons: Some consumers who prefer strong coffee found Caramelizio too weak
Occasional dented or crushed pods have been found in the boxes upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Almost expired and dented
customer_reviews.text: I am Scoring this product a two star for two reasons. First of all almost every one of the Nespresso pods is dented. Secondly, I am not impressed at all to see that the expiration date on two of the three tubes of 10 pods each expires next month. These are way too close to the expiration date, and these should have been offered a discounted price Advising about the very soon expiration date.
customer_reviews.author: Christy from Montana

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive pods and no other pods fit the new Nespresso machine
customer_reviews.text: I love the Nespresso Vertuoline coffees but they are WAYYYY too expensive. I have the machine and I buy the coffee, the coffee is delicious but it really is very expensive and I don't think there is a valid reason for it. You buy the machine and that's the ONLY coffees that fit it! They changed it up from the older models, probably for that reason, people could buy cheaper pods that were just as good!
customer_reviews.author: janee

customer_reviews.title: Variety is the spice of life!
customer_reviews.text: I got to review the nespresso virtuoline in early 2016, and while I am a mild coffee lover, these three flavors take me to a the little trattoria in my dreams in every cup. It's smooth and velvety with no aftertaste, and the best part is I make it MYSELF. 3 complementary flavors for whatever mood strikes me, and the value for all 3 is UNBEATABLE.
customer_reviews.author: TheSovereign

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Every single pod seal was compromised. I will be ordering direct from the Nespresso website next time.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene J. Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Think Twice
customer_reviews.text: I received this today January 4th but the expiration date is next month (February). I have to drink at least two a day to get my money's worth. The rating would be higher if the item had a better shelf life. These were manufactured in March 2018 and the "best before" date is next month. Definitively not the freshest product.
customer_reviews.author: azalak696

customer_reviews.title: Customer Choice is better
customer_reviews.text: We tried all three flavors but only liked one..wish there was a way to swap unwanted flavors. When will amazon allow for more individual flavors selection...??? A sleeve of 10 with my chosen flavors is much better buy to me.
customer_reviews.author: EmmSei

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and tasty. Don't be fooled by the flavors' names, this coffee does not taste exactly like Hazelnut, Vanilla or Caramel from the coffee store. It has only very light aroma. However, I love it, it is not as overwhelming as in the "store-coffee".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Subtle Carmel Flavor - A Great Way To Start (or End!) The Day.
customer_reviews.text: If you typically get a shot of carmel syrup at Starbucks, this is not for you. It makes a delicious cup of coffee with a hint of carmel. The flavoring is much more subtle, is not imitation/fakey tasting, and does not overwhelm the flavor of the coffee or add 150 calories. :) To me, this is perfect, and I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: lawyer_man

customer_reviews.title: Coffee is good but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Very good coffee, I just wish they weren't so expensive and there's nothing you can do about it except pay it. The Nespresso VertuoLine Coffee machine has no other, lower cost suppliers. I don't even know where I could buy them in Tulsa so I have to buy them online. The Nespresso coffee is really, really good, but I wish I would have looked at another manufacturer who makes a similar coffee maker, had I know, I would not have bought a VertuoLine!
customer_reviews.author: janee

customer_reviews.title: Have they changed packaging
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been ordering these capsules without problems for 2 years and my recent order came with no sleeve in the boxes and the coffee tasting bitter and watery, not to mention that the aluminum is so thin the grains collect around the interior ring. I don’t know if this is coincidental but two days later my year old machine broke down. Are these actually Nespresso produced capsules or did I receive three boxes of fake capsules
customer_reviews.author: Informed consumer

customer_reviews.title: I really like my Vertuoline machine and the coffee
customer_reviews.text: I really like my Vertuoline machine and the coffee. It is much better than what I got from the other coffee machines with pods that I have owned. If you have not tried a Nespresso machine you should.
customer_reviews.author: GraphicShadow

customer_reviews.title: keeps me awake at work!
customer_reviews.text: Money saving tip! buy these 3packs! I go through at least 1 pod a day, if you have a family likely you go through more. The 3 pack comes out to basically $11 per. Retail price is $12 per. so save 3 dollars in total, and going through 3 packs a month, in 10 years youll have saved $360! ....if they keep this pricing for 10 years. and coffee still exists in the world. .......and if the world still exists.
customer_reviews.author: Akirax187

customer_reviews.title: Order from Nespresso
customer_reviews.text: This is our favorite coffee and we loved the convenience of being to order them from amazon. HOWEVER...... our last 4-5 orders from amazon didn’t taste right..... very weak and watery. We ordered some directly from Nespresso to make sure it wasn’t us/our machine.... and it wasn’t. AMAZING coffee when purchased from Nespresso.
customer_reviews.author: Just little old me

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I just got these today. I was a little nervous from some of the reviews that they were damaged or seemed counterfeit but there was a delay in shipping from the Nespresso store so I ordered these in a pinch. I am VERY pleased that none of the pods were damaged and they are legitimate. I am not sure why some of the reviewers were having such bad luck but luckily mine were the real deal and in perfect condition. These flavors are the absolute best and I am really glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice flavor
customer_reviews.text: If you like flavored coffee that's subtle, not overwhelming, this might be the one for you. Of course, if you don't like caramel, then don't get this one. The flavor is distinctly caramel, but not overpowering or fake tasting. Sometimes I need a second cup in the morning, and I'll have this one. My guests always LOVE this one, so I keep it on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Laura

customer_reviews.title: Fake Product, and You Can't Return It
customer_reviews.text: This is not Nespresso - the aluminum top is clearly not a Nespresso product. The coffee tastes like gas station coffee (and not the good kind!). There is virtually no caffeine contained within these pods, while the regular Nespresso has so much. Amazon won't let me return this. This is an absolute waste of 35+ dollar. UPDATE: Amazon was really great about the return process. However, this is still a fake product.
customer_reviews.author: Apollo

customer_reviews.title: The most intense hazelnut flavor of any coffee.  Absolutely delicious.
customer_reviews.text: I love hazelnut, but couldn't find k-cup types that were any good. My husband took a chance and surprised me with a Nespresso Vertuo machine for Valentine's Day. So, I had to try the Hazelino flavored coffee. OMG, This is the winner! The most natural, flavorful hazelnut coffee I've ever had. Even while it's brewing it fills the kitchen with toasted hazelnut aromas, just as if I were toasting the actual nuts! The coffee foam is so rich that adding cream is totally optional. Also, the other espresso types are very good so far.
customer_reviews.author: L. V. Perrotta

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: Ok I like these. But, I just say, this one that I just ordered is not as good as the others. The flavor is off, not quite vanilla not quite any other taste, just more sweet than regular coffee. If you’re ordering these pods, buy the unflavored ones. Add your own flavoring. Trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Not expired or dented. Best price I could find.
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit nervous buying this set of pods because others had reported receiving nearly expired product or heavily dented pods. I must say, that was not an issue at all for me (see attached photos). I've plenty of time to enjoy these before they expire. They're in impeccable condition. The price beat out other options I saw. I dont know if its optimal. I'm new to the nespresso. Ive only owned my machine for about a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Lanius

customer_reviews.title: EXPIRED
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these several times & never even thought to check the expiration date....until now! I always thought it was strange that they didn't come packaged the same as they do directly from Nespresso. Yes, they were expired. I will order straight from the Nespresso site from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Jtino

customer_reviews.title: I rate this a DO NOT BUY item.
customer_reviews.text: These pods were horrible! Each one produced a weak bad tasting cup. No creama. I've purchased many other vertuo pods on Amazon with no problem. Amazon offers no return on these and evidently no refund either. I'll avoid this vendor in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ray L

customer_reviews.title: SO STRONG AND UNBEARABLE
customer_reviews.text: These 3 are probably the worst flavors Nespresso produces! Hazelnut was by far the worst, it was very unbearable, so nutty and strong I couldn’t drink the coffee no matter how much milk or creamer I put it. Caramel was the second to worst flavor. Again it was unbearable the taste, so syrupy and strong. Vanilla was probably the best one out of all 3. Not to strong and light vanilla taste. UNFORTUNATELY I threw out the caramel and hazelnut pods after 2 months because no one in my office liked it or drank it. I’ll stick to Stormio, Double Espresso, Odacio, Mellozio, and Fortado.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to order a variety
customer_reviews.text: These Nespresso refills are about the same price on Amazon and on Nespresso's website, but I like being able to order just a few specific flavors here. The Hazelino is one of my favorites. It arrived promptly and I had no issues with it. I don't consider any of the Nespresso Vertuoline capsules a good value as compared to brewing a pot of coffee, but I do like them for the mornings when I want a super-fast brew.
customer_reviews.author: Aderyn

customer_reviews.title: Delicious vanilla taste. Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Always beautifully packaged, not that anybody really cares about that. I'm not a huge coffee drinker but I've become once since we got our Nespresso machine. This has a great vanilla taste and coupled with some natural vanilla syrup/creamer, I LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rizo

customer_reviews.title: Top quality, not overpowering, the perfect coffee treat
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's expensive, and yes, it's the best cup of coffee you'll get in your neighborhood at a fraction of the barista price, without the attitude. The caramel flavor of the Caramelizio complements the coffee and isn't fake in nature or overpowering in taste. This coffee takes perfectly to cream and a touch of sweetener. The only problem, it's such a challenge to get a good cup of coffee when I'm away from home...
customer_reviews.author: Mark SA Smith

customer_reviews.title: Tried to love it... couldn’t
customer_reviews.text: I just couldn’t love this coffee. Tried the Hazelino and almost every other Nespresso pod. Every single one taste so bitter to me. I love coffee and frequent coffee shops for a good espresso or latte. This just didn’t fit the bill. Maybe it’s just me but I couldn’t get past the bitter “bite” of this coffee brand. Ordered my machine from the company. Returned it 2 weeks later. Going back to old school coffee maker. I’ll keep buying the occasional latte for now.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Strong and acidic
customer_reviews.text: I love flavored coffee and I drink my coffee black. None of these taste like the named flavor and they are all WAY too strong and acidic. Yuk!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Best Flavor Ever
customer_reviews.text: Dear Nespresso, Please please please bring this flavor back on your website. Caramelizio is the only reason I have a Nespresso machine. Your new replacement "Caramel Cookie" has zero caramel taste and is absolutely terrible. When I'm finished buying all the Caramelizio left on Amazon I'll most likely be taking my Nespresso machine down to Goodwill because I will no longer have any need for it.
customer_reviews.author: badgergirl75

customer_reviews.title: This Coffee Though
customer_reviews.text: As if we needed another reason to love Nespresso. This variety pack is perfect! I am a hazelnut enthusiast, but the vanilla and caramel are just as delicious. My boyfriend and I used to go to Starbucks or Caribou everyday and we're not missing it whatsoever. We went from spending $10 a day, down to just $2. Will definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: My wife LOVES this product and we order in mass quantities. Sadly they are retiring this flavor and my wife is distraught. As with all of the Nespresso flavors this is a strong coffee but with a caramel flavoring. My wife drinks about 5 cups a day. She loves it and only drinks this. Highly recommended. Sadly a little expensive but that is all Nespresso coffees.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Lubitz

customer_reviews.title: so so
customer_reviews.text: My wife always wanted a Nespresso coffee machine. I bought it for her. We ordered capsules for her, as they were cheaper on Amazon. The packaging design is very beautiful, it looks expensive, but when my wife tried this coffee for the first time, she just put the mug on the table and said that she didn’t want to drink this coffee, as it was very bitter. I tried it, it also seemed very bitter to me. The question is, did we buy a fake, or is it coffee? We liked only one of the 3 tastes, as it tasted softer.
customer_reviews.author: Viacheslav N.

customer_reviews.title: I do NOT recommend. TOO EXPENSIVE
customer_reviews.text: I like my Nespresso machine, but these coffee pods are ridiculously overpriced. I don’t recommend getting them. They are pretty bland in flavor and it is so hard to find the right coffee that you like because it costs upwards of $10.00 for each sleeve. The American style machine that takes these pods is just another way to charge you more for their coffee. If you get the smaller espresso pods, they are seriously reduced in price and just as good with a bit of milk. I will not continue to buy these pods. I believe I will trade in my machine for a better model that is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Caramel Flavor is Very Strong
customer_reviews.text: The product being actual coffee grounds and not an instant mix, I thought the caramel flavoring would be subtle. The caramel flavor is extreme and too much for my liking. It was almost like drinking a full on caramel macchiato without the sweet, which made it taste kind of odd. 3 stars because me not liking the flavor is a personal preference thing.
customer_reviews.author: Hikkilove

customer_reviews.title: Flavors are just okay...
customer_reviews.text: I received Carmelizio, Hazelino, and Vanizio. The Vanizio flavor was my least favorite because it tastes watered down to me with no hint of vanilla, it also doesn't froth the same as the other pods I've tried. I wouldn't buy this pack again.
customer_reviews.author: LM_Chascona

customer_reviews.title: Expires soon
customer_reviews.text: Product expiration date is less than 3 months from date of arrival
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: It's good, but it should be more affordable
customer_reviews.text: I think you cannot go wrong with Nespresso coffee, but the fact that their prices are the same throughout the whole market is a little ridiculous. I think that they should make their pods more affordable especially if you want to buy in bulk. I am tired of spending over $1 for each pod. I get it it's good coffee, but it should at least be a little more affordable. the Medium Roast Coffee is my go to pack. I like it and I would buy more but they need to reconsider their pricings.
customer_reviews.author: Abdul

customer_reviews.title: Avoid buying
customer_reviews.text: All the flavors aren't good as expected, vanilla is the worst which i expected to be the best. But if i had to rate from best to worst it'd be 1)hazlenut 2)caramel 3)vanilla. I'll stick to regular coffee caps from now on
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Pino

customer_reviews.title: Warning
customer_reviews.text: Flavor additives and too watery when finished. Tastes cheap. Sent the coffee maker and capsules back after these made me sick
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wright Jr

customer_reviews.title: would not order again
customer_reviews.text: The flavored coffees are not flavored at all and are downright awful so disappointed as I love the regular nespresso coffee
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unlike any cup of coffee you will taste
customer_reviews.text: I would have never known about this AMAZING cup of coffee/Nespresso machine has to offer had I not been offered one at my friend’s home. It’s frothy, creamy, full of flavor and better than Starbucks!!!! Even though each cup’s cost breaks down to about a dollar each, I don’t have the need to ever order Starbucks again for that “gourmet” or “special” feeling!!! And I save about $4 a day! The machine is easy peezy too! You don’t have to do anything but push the button. This one my all time finds!!!! If you love coffee/cappuccino you will absolutely love these pods and the Nespresso machine that makes it.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: No More Starbucks Addiction
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this product every month for the past year. Nothing beats this coffee. Add a splash of milk and you have a homemade Carmel latte for a fraction of the cost. The pods are larger than past models so I find it easiest to unbox them and dump them out in a small counter tote. I found this one at Home Goods. 7” x 8” x 9” comfortably holds 66 pods. The Caffeine & Quarantine mug was purchased on Amazon through an Etsy artist. (May 2020)
customer_reviews.author: Amberlc

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth taste
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this flavor and have bought several boxes of this same blend. It's very smooth and tasty. Of course the Virtuoline is more expensive than the original so I kind of ration them for special days. They are recyclable through Nespresso when you get the bag to send them in or drop them off at a Nespresso store. There's no store close to me so I send them in, which is free and Nespresso provides the bags for free also.
customer_reviews.author: Jilliebean

customer_reviews.title: Icky and chemically tasting
customer_reviews.text: Did not care for this flavor AT ALL and now have them just sitting in the cabinet because we will never use them but they’re too pricey to just trash lol. The flavor is very artificial and chemically and has an odd aftertaste. Loved the Carmelizio and am a fan of Hazelnut but this misses the mark on taste.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanna W

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: We love the flavor of these pods, and if there’s no sale on Nespresso’s site, this is a convenient way to order a smaller stash. Only dislike is the waste of cardboard / paper in the packaging - looks nice but makes the pods less environmentally friendly.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne

customer_reviews.title: A perfect mix of lightly flavored coffee .
customer_reviews.text: These do not have sweet tastes of Carmel, Vanilla or Hazelnuts . But rather subtle hints of the flavors . These are medium roasts and I love a cup in the afternoon with a biscotti or cookie.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: They are not authentic pods!!! They do not work in the Machine it is supposed to bc it is not the authentic ppd. You can tell from the moment you open the box. Also the taste is horrible!! One pod “worked” and tasted like garbage. The second pod returned an error and wouldn’t even brew. Do yourself a favor and purchase from the company.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Works with only certain kinds of Nespresso machines.
customer_reviews.text: Moved into a new office for 4 months. They had a Nespresso machine there that used these. I loved it immediately. This Hazelino is my personal favorite flavor. Had to hide them so coworkers didn't nab em. Now, I have to buy a Nespresso machine for my normal office. Don't think I'll be able to go back to the regular coffee machine. But these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best Coffee! I like this coffee maker better than the Keurig.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrett A.

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with the price on this - some sellers overcharge ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the price on this - some sellers overcharge for these pods. It came exactly as described, sealed in the original boxes. Will purchase again! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these so badly. I prefer darker/bold coffee but these sounded good so I figured I'd give them a shot! They had a stronger acidic aftertaste than I was expecting. The caramel and vanilla were the best, and I had to give the hazelnut away.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Nolden

customer_reviews.title: Nespresso coffee is really good, rich in taste
customer_reviews.text: Nespresso coffee is really good, rich in taste...not watery at all. As for pricing, it is completelly untrue that pods are cheaper at nespresso.com. The cost is the same $ 1.10 per pod and you have to buy minimum 50. So Amazon price for 30 pods is pretty fair.
customer_reviews.author: N. Feddersen

customer_reviews.title: Great way to try different flavors. Caramel was my favorite
customer_reviews.text: An Great box of 3 flavors. All fabulous. Really a good way to try some different flavor selections and Amazons price is really good. If you are wanting to try some different flavors order this selection
customer_reviews.author: Marc Desciscio

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these
customer_reviews.text: Once you switch to Nepresso coffee, all other is just ehh. So good, and for $1 per cup, it's soo worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Miller

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Capsules - can’t be returned
customer_reviews.text: 4 out of the 10 capsules in one box were damaged. Will be ordering from Nespresso direct going forward so that can get those capsules replaced.
customer_reviews.author: karencrisp

customer_reviews.title: Rich, subtle flavor
customer_reviews.text: If you're expecting flavors to just burst on your taste buds, this might not be the coffee for you. This has a very rich coffee aroma with very subtle notes of the flavor of your choosing. I love how frothy my nespresso coffee comes out and topped with some frothy sweet creme, it beats starbucks any day.
customer_reviews.author: Krystina

customer_reviews.title: 1 of 3 NOT GOOD (unless tree bark is acceptable to your taste buds)
customer_reviews.text: 2/3 Good... the Hazelino is a deal-breaker. I like Hazelnut flavor, but this conjured up a taste of tree bark. Get a different variety pack. What am I going to do with a full sleeve of these (minus the one that scarred my taste buds)? ;)
customer_reviews.author: DadOfFour

customer_reviews.title: DRINK ME!!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite flavors. This pack is a great value as you will spend more on other sites. Great variety of flavors. Overall great purchase and yummmy!
customer_reviews.author: K n M

customer_reviews.title: Caramel flavor lacking but the price is better than Nespresso
customer_reviews.text: There was not really much caramel flavoring in these. I am so glad to find that Amazon is offering Vertuoline capsules. They are a couple dollars less than the Nespresso web site. If you are a Prime member then you get free two day shipping. Nespresso can't beat that. Don't get me wrong Nespresso Vertuo capsules are not cheap. But the coffee flavor beats the pants off my Keurig.
customer_reviews.author: zztop3

customer_reviews.title: We found an at home Starbucks! Yummy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We feel as if we found an at home Starbucks! It’s so delicious, rich and robust, and frothy! We have been waiting to try these and they are great! Pricey for a coffee, but cheaper than buying Starbucks everyday! Had no issues with expiration dates and came with no damage like some. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: The Walls Household

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: I normally order from nespresso direct. But love the vanilla so I liked the 3 pack deal. Much cheaper then other Nespresso packs from other sellers. It’s got a great flavor and just the right amount though I do add a little vanilla syrup if I use my milk frother. It’s also really good with caramel or salted caramel syrup.
customer_reviews.author: Lindz

customer_reviews.title: They are a delicious afternoon treat
customer_reviews.text: Love all the flavors. These are a little more pricy than a regular cup of coffee but so well worth it for an afternoon pick me up treat. The smooth foamy coffee is delicious, especially with a little Italian Sweet Cream creamer to make the coffee a bit sweater. Very quick and easy to make.. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: GRACE

customer_reviews.title: open box missing coffee capsules wrong coffee sent
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be 3 different coffees. I received 2 of the same and the 3rd one was different BUT it was open, no sleeve inside- capsules just thrown in and some were missing.
customer_reviews.author: aldo

customer_reviews.title: These taste artificial
customer_reviews.text: These all tasted really artificial and made it hard for me to finish my cup to be really honest. I am just going to stick with the regular (Unflavored) coffee pods.
customer_reviews.author: AM.Artist

customer_reviews.title: Fake Nespresso pods
customer_reviews.text: I have revived this package and I let took me a while to realize that these were fake aka not true Nespresso pods! Since I steady used most and unable to return I am greatly disappointed as flavor and intensity were weak and I will not be buying this kind of package again! Buyers beware!
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Not for espresso lovers
customer_reviews.text: I love drinking Nespresso coffee and enjoy the espresso and double espresso pods a lot. One day I saw this on site and figured to give a try. However, these flavored coffee pod just disappointed me. The flavors are so subtle and coffee tastes bitter and watery than it should. I tried to add whole milk to it to gain some creamy flavors but it won’t fix it. Won’t buy them again. For espresso lovers, stick to espresso pod or double espresso pod.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I hate is when my box comes all taped up looking ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I hate is when my box comes all taped up looking like it just came from the Yukon. I feel like I missed out on a great trip with my favorite​ coffee
customer_reviews.author: matter to matter

customer_reviews.title: I got this pack for my husband.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves variety, so I got him this to explore. We are avid Nepresso coffee folks, and usually buy off of their site, though we were needing some pods FAST, so we tried Amazon. We got it in two days, and bingo! We like this faster option.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Kaer

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor, less acidic
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite flavor so far from this brand. I have tried several including the sample pack. It has a subtle caramel flavor and the coffee doesn't make my stomach feel as acidic as some of the other kinds from this brand. That being said, I still don't LOVE this coffee. But it's the best one I've found so far that fits with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaCarlton

customer_reviews.title: Caffeine is not strong for me
customer_reviews.text: I love Nespressos flavors but no matter what kind I drink,I still feel sleepy. I usually go to Starbucks and get black coffee and it will help me throughout the day. I have tried variety of Nespresso and unfortunately I still feel like the caffeine doesnt hit me.
customer_reviews.author: ZhaE

customer_reviews.title: Be sure- Not returnable
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally bought the wrong size and could not return them. Therefore I don’t know anything about the flavor. I think the value is poor since I can’t use them. We tried to open one of these little guys to use the coffee in a reusable coffee pod. Too much trouble!
customer_reviews.author: Memer

customer_reviews.title: Always good, a good value but always feels pricey
customer_reviews.text: We really like the flavor and simplicity we get with these but the price always makes me feel like it's not a great value which irks me. I prefer this to the over priced coffee shops but we definitely consume more since it's so available. Wish it was just a slightly better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy B

customer_reviews.title: Taste Great.  Pricey.
customer_reviews.text: The Nespresso Vertuoline coffee pods are heads and shoulders above any kcup i've ever had from Keurig. The do not have secondary options, so all pods are made/sold by Nespresso. That said, they are 2-3x the price of what I typically get in my kcups. You can expect to pay about $1.10 per cup with this line of coffee. From what I've read, they don't plan on releasing their patent or allowing third party sellers anytime soon. Great, bold flavor everytime. If you are looking for that "coffeehouse" cup of coffee, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Maddux

customer_reviews.title: Hazelnut and caramel is great flavors
customer_reviews.text: When you pour a coffee into a see-through glass or just a mug it has that two-tone coffee affect the foam on the top in the coffee on the bottom really cool for presentation taste great depends what flavor you get some are very strong Hazelnut and caramel is great flavors
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Wont buy again
customer_reviews.text: Diluted!?!?! Thought it was just one but all!! So confused.. are these fake/ counterfeit?? only buy from nespresso
customer_reviews.author: susan m.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite flavors
customer_reviews.text: Love these flavors and the packaging. You just pop open one end and it’s like a little assembly line of pods! My husband and I prefer the Carmel and vanilla but the hazelnut is good too, just a bit sour sometimes. Top off with some delicious creamer or in my case coconut milk and you’re good to go!
customer_reviews.author: claire

customer_reviews.title: Sad about the cost
customer_reviews.text: We got a nespresso machine and were blissfully unaware that the pods cost so dang much. Without an option to convert to a reusable eco-friendly option, we likely won't continue purchasing. They are tasty and do create a delicious espresso drink but feel irresponsible to continue buying.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Arrived fast and NOT damaged 👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: Coffee is fresh tasting and delightful. Came not damaged as I seen others have. Fit perfectly in the box. (After opening the boxes I put them back in the package)
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: New Nespresso: Great Flavors
customer_reviews.text: These are new to vertuo line, and it is a great new take on their flavored originals. These have even an extra tasty hint at the end of the coffee. Would definitely recommend, good way to mix things up in your coffee routine.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Love them...except Vanilla...
customer_reviews.text: Hazelnut and Caramel are flavored just right. Vanilla is kinda meh. These also were considerably late and the price was the same as ordering direct from Nespresso. Will probably stick to ordering straight from the source going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Josh R

customer_reviews.title: Got A fake coffee
customer_reviews.text: Got A fake coffee Every few weeks I’m ordering vanilla pods. Last delivery has bitter horrible test not even close to the usual test. When I pay so much for the coffee and getting for my money a total fake...Time for the new coffee machine then...
customer_reviews.author: IM

customer_reviews.title: Very artificial tasting
customer_reviews.text: The blurb did not make clear that this was artificially flavored. When it said caramel notes I thought it was describing the naturally occurring flavor in the coffee. And for an artificially flavored coffee this is very artificial tasting. It’s very difficult to drink because the flavor is so strong and unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: smeli18

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee lousy machine
customer_reviews.text: We love the coffee pods but I would not get the Vertoline Nespresso machine again as the coffee maker coffee only comes out warm and requires 30 seconds in the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: marinjoe

customer_reviews.title: Good, but miss the mounting sleeves!!
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor, pricey . Wish they still came in the sleeves like they used to so I could easily mount them in my rotating carousel. They stopped packaging them with the sleeves so now they’re all loose inside but I didn’t see any cost savings as the consumer. Still, great flavor
customer_reviews.author: delighted

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the Nespresso line
customer_reviews.text: These are so delicious with their little custard flavor. I like my coffee black with a nice smooth flavor and with just the right strength. Nespresso and its vertuoline never let me down, and this is basically the best coffee I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Davidson

customer_reviews.title: weak flavor and expensive on this pack
customer_reviews.text: i actually didn't find the flavor very strong on these coffees. . my other pack was the stormio pack etc the stronger pack, they had good flavor. however i found the flavor of these to be to weak could not really tell they where vanilla, caramel etc
customer_reviews.author: Christopher P.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think these are original. I’ve had bad luck ordering on amazon for my pods. They don’t taste like anything. They aren’t expired but they just have no flavor at all. Very disappointing. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: Caramel cookie? Vanilla custard? Hazelnut muffin? More like dirty feet, dead fish, and poop. I have yet to taste a nespresso pod that TASTES good. These don’t even taste like coffee. Disappointed and am selling my stupid machine. I can’t figure out why someone would name these tastes something that seems sweet but isn’t. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The best coffee, and they have a recycle program which is much better than Keurig. Still a bit expensive but much better than any other coffee.
customer_reviews.author: austinandroid

customer_reviews.title: Love the flavored Nesspresso
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite flavors. I have purchased multiple times and will keep purchasing. My only concern is the price, as it is a little high for a cup of coffee at home. It is $11 a sleeve of Nespresso. You can buy the same on Nespresso.com but who can beat prime shipping.
customer_reviews.author: joy

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like soap...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried all three caramel cookie hazelnut muffin and vanilla custard pie.... All I can say is I love Nespresso and every flavor that I’ve had in the past but this taste like soap! Horrible flavors they don’t taste like anything just very bitter and soap like. I don’t know if this is actual Nespresso coffee or a knock off? But it seriously tastes gross. So disappointing but because for the price I was expecting fabulous... And this is nowhere near I would steer clear of this.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne David

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee. I literally go to bed thinking about the fact that I’ll be drinking this when I get up in the morning. It’s my favorite. Pods are pricier than keurig, but 2 pods is still less money than a drip coffee at Starbucks, so I’m good with that.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Something is off
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I thought maybe the Intenso pods that I bought were just off and maybe if I tried another of my favorites I would have better results. Sadly, these are also not as good as the Hazelino straight from Nespresso's website. These are either fake or just really stale, I won't be buying any Nespresso pods off of Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Priya

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee high price
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee but the price is ridiculous . The virtuline machine hasn’t got cheaper pods that fit the machine so you have to buy what Nespresso sells. It’s good coffee but I’ve had lesser priced, really good coffee from cheaper pods that fit in the original machine and can’t understand why Virtuline’s price for pods doesn’t come down.
customer_reviews.author: janee

customer_reviews.title: Not individually labeled like it shows
customer_reviews.text: These are not individually labeled as it shows in the pictures, they just have the logo on the capsules. So if you take them out of the box, you better remember the colors. I've gotten a few like this from Amazon and it's annoying trying to pick coffee from the display
customer_reviews.author: Alfred

customer_reviews.title: Good price...better than Nespresso
customer_reviews.text: I don't really like this coffee but my husband does. He seems to really enjoy it and for the price we will definitely order this bundle again!
customer_reviews.author: Joesgirl6708

customer_reviews.title: The best flavor of all!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this flavor Nespresso Vertuo coffee. The Caramelizio isn't too strong, but just enough to give a nice hint of caramel flavor. So delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Curran

customer_reviews.title: The REAL thing!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews about people getting fake pods which sucks. This is coming from Nespresso and the quality of these pods are pretty strong compared to a keurig. I never need to finish the whole cup. This is my second order. The flavors are yummy!
customer_reviews.author: E. Licia

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite flavor! Of course I have an arsenal of flavors in my drawer this is my daily go to. So smooth with a delicate vanilla flavor. I just add half and half and never need any sugar. I love that it is pretty much always available to buy on Amazon since I don’t have a Nespresso store nearby.
customer_reviews.author: gme123

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee but a little pricy
customer_reviews.text: I like my Nespresso a lot and I like these flavors. But it is more expensive than other brand like kcup... I guess you get what you pay, so I still buying them and keep my Nespresso!
customer_reviews.author: A. X.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied but confused
customer_reviews.text: Good buy but some suppliers of Barrista versions not so good. Addicted coffee drinker so a repeat buyer. Why can’t Amazon weed out the bum suppliers of good but high priced items like this? I e objected to that bad buy elsewhere in your system but this shipment was as represented.
customer_reviews.author: Wriley C. A. Wood

product_meta.title: Nespresso Capsules VertuoLine, Caramelizio, Medium Roast Coffee, 30 Count Coffee Pods, Brews 7.8oz
product_meta.description: Lightly roasted Arabica beans from Brazil and Central America reveal notes of caramelized sugar and subtle scents of vanilla. Adding milk enhances sweet brioche notes in a mellow texture
feature_bullets: CARAMEL FLAVORED: This Nespresso coffee is created from a blend of Arabica coffee beans from Brazil and Central America to reveal notes of caramelized sugar and a subtle scent of vanilla
INTENSITY 6: This Nespresso coffee blend displays a smooth and balanced coffee that is sweet to the taste all in easy to use Nespresso Capsules
CARAMELIZIO COFFEE BREWS 7.8 OZ : These Nespresso VertuoLine pods provide you with a 7.8 OZ serving of coffee which is perfect for a longer drinking experience

WE RECYCLE: Nespresso aluminum capsules are fully recyclable and guarantee coffee freshness - we provide different options for recycling your used aluminum coffee pods to fulfill our collective commitment to protecting the environment

VERTUOLINE ONLY: Nespresso Vertuo delivers you a full range of cup sizes and coffee styles from espresso to Alto XL with easy to use Nespresso pods. Enjoy hot or pour over ice. (VertuoLine Capsules are not compatible with OriginalLine machines )

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
